title: Locations Of Interest Artwork
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:paperstack]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar]]

[[module CSS]]
@media (min-width: 768px) {
    #main-content { max-width: min(900px, calc(100% - 4rem)); }
}
:root {
  --header-subtitle: "Locations of Interest";
  --sp_header-subtitle-scale: 2.125;
}
#header h1 a::before, #header h2 span::before {
    font-family: 'BauhausLTDemi', 'Nanum Gothic', 'Arial', sans-serif;
}

body {
    background-image: linear-gradient(
        to bottom,
        #FCFCFC, #FCFCFC 100%);
}

div#extra-div-1 {
    height: 140px;
    width: 100%;
    top: 28px;
    position: absolute;
    background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/sigma-9-themes/SCP_F.png");
    background-size: contain;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: calc(50vw - 380px) 50%;
    z-index: -1;
}
@media (max-width: 767px) {
    div#extra-div-1 {
         opacity: 0.2;
         background-position: 50% 50%;
    }
}

.socontent.header h1 {
    font-size: 1.85rem;
    max-width: max-content;
    margin: 2.5rem auto 1rem;
}
.socontent.header h1 span {
    padding: 0 .25em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

.art-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-content: center;
    justify-content: space-around;
    align-self: flex-end
    gap: 5rem 5rem;
}

.art-container .art {
    flex: 0 1 280px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art1 {
    flex: 0 1 280px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art1 .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}

.art-container .art2 {
    flex: 0 1 200px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art2 .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}


.art-container .art3 {
    flex: 0 1 320px;
    text-align: center;
    padding-bottom: 1rem;
}

.art-container .art3 .image-container {
    padding: 0;
    min-height: 100%;
    max-width: 100%;
}
[[/module]]
@@@@
[[[jerden-insignia| Jerden's Art Page]]] / [[[Locations of Interest]]] » Locations Of Interest Artwork

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

A separate page for the various designs I created to represent various Nexuses, Freeports, and other [[[Locations of Interest]]]. With thanks to [[*user Ralliston]], I'm pretty sure I got the idea to make these from his request for me to make an Esterberg flag for the [[[esterberg-city-wikipedia|Wikipedia page]]].

[[=]]
+ Flags
[[/=]]
@@@@
[[div class="art-container"]]  

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Antarctic-Empire.svg title="Flag of the Antarctic Empire." height="150px"]]
A flag for the [[[locations-of-interest#antarctic-empire| Third Atlantic Empire]]], the civilisation from [[[SCP-1483]]]. A stylised depiction of the Southern Lights over a range of (not snow-covered!) mountains. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Esterberg.svg title="Esterberg Flag." height="150px"]]
A Flag for [[[locations-of-interest#esterberg| Esterberg]]], with black, green and blue to represent yeren, fae and humans, with a sun to represent a new day dawning for the three species together.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Esterberg-triumvirate.svg title="Esterberg Flag (Triumviraté)." height="150px"]]
An alternative design for the Esterberg Flag, but apparently the stars are associated with Queen Mab, so this design could be used by the far-right fae monarchists of Triumviraté.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Eurtec.svg title="Eurtec Flag" height="150px"]]
A flag for [[[locations-of-interest#eurtec|Eurtec]]], with a circuit board pentagram to look European, technological, and occult.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Hong-Shing.svg title="Hong Shing Flag." height="150px" style="border:1px solid black;"]]
Flag for the anomalous city of [[[locations-of-interest#hong-shing| Hong Shing]]] ([https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-cn-1997 SCP-CN-1997]), using the Taijitu as a representation of intertwined duality.
[[/div]]
[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Hy-Brasil.svg title="Hy-Brasil Flag." height="150px"]]
The Flag of [[[locations-of-interest#hy-brasil| Hy-Brasil]]] ([[[Nx-03]]]), depicting the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_Treasures_of_the_Tuatha_D%C3%A9_Danann Four Treasures of the Tuatha Dé Danann]. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Samothrace.svg title="Samothrace Flag." height="150px"]]
Flag for the  [[[locations-of-interest#samothrace| Islamic Republic of Eastern Samothrace]]] ([[[SCP-1173]]]), based on an [https://www.reddit.com/r/vexillology/comments/5fz992/my_idea_for_the_flag_of_the_islamic_republic_of/ existing design] and the flags of [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Greek_flag_(black_cross).svg Thrace], [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Flag_of_Greece.svg Greece] and [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Flag_of_Turkey.svg Turkey]. 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Sjhlfels-am-Rhein.svg title="Sjhlfels am Rhein Flag." height="150px" style="border:1px solid black;"]]
Swiss Style Flag for [[[locations-of-interest#sjhfels| Sjhlfels am Rhein]]], based on the flags of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z%C3%BCrich Zürich] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Zeeland Zeeland], with a nine pointed star from the [[[magierakademie-hub|Mage's Academy]]].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Tlaneyanco.svg title="Flag of Tlaneyanco." height="150px"]] 
Flag for the  [[[locations-of-interest#tlaneyanco| Kingdom of Tlaneyanco]]], from the [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/hub-sueno-nuclear Nuclear Dream] canon. Red, Orange, Amber and Green are the [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/dragones-tonatiuh four colors of the Tonatiuh Dragons].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art1"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Flag-Tlaneyanco-border.svg title="Flag of Tlaneyanco with border." height="150px" padding="10px"]]
The same flag with an Aztec-style border, at [[*user Luis Gm]]'s request.
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@@@

[[=]]
+ Coats of Arms
[[/=]]
@@@@
[[div class="art-container"]]
[[div class="art2"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/COA-Alagadda.svg title="Alagadda Coat of Arms." height="265px"]]
Coat of Arms for  [[[locations-of-interest#alagadda | Alagadda]]] - the [/system:page-tags/tag/hanged-king Hanged King's] personal insignia.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art2"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/COA-Esterberg.svg title="Esterberg Coat of Arms." height="200px" style="padding-top:70px"]] 
A Coat of Arms for [[[locations-of-interest#esterberg| Esterberg]]], with the sun in a blue sky representing Humans (Children of the Sun), the starry sky representing Yeren (Children of the Night), and the oak tree on a grassy hill representing Fae (Children of the Forest). 
[[/div]]

[[div class="art2"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/COA-Hy-Brasil.svg title="Hy-Brasil Coat of Arms." height="200px" style="padding-top:70px"]]
The Coat of Arms of [[[locations-of-interest#hy-brasil| Hy-Brasil]]] ([[[Nx-03]]]), depicting the [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Four_Treasures_of_the_Tuatha_D%C3%A9_Danann Four Treasures of the Tuatha Dé Danann]. Somewhat inspired by the [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Provincial_Arms_of_Ireland.svg Combined Arms of Ireland].
[[/div]]

[[div class="art2"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/COA-Sjhlfels-am-Rhein.svg title="Sjhlfels am Rhein Coat of Arms." height="200px" style="padding-top:70px"]] 
Coat of Arms for [[[locations-of-interest#sjhfels| Sjhlfels am Rhein]]], based on the flags of [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z%C3%BCrich Zürich] and [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flag_of_Zeeland Zeeland], with a nine pointed star from the [[[magierakademie-hub|Mage's Academy]]].
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

[[=]]
+ Signs
[[/=]]
@@@@
[[div class="art-container"]]  

[[div class="art3"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Sign-Boring.svg title="Boring Sign." height="200px"]]
A [[[locations-of-interest#boring|Boring]]] sign.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art3"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Sign-Undervegas.svg title="Undervegas Sign." height="190px" style="background-color:black; padding-top: 10px; padding-right: 20px;  padding-left: 20px;"]]
A sign for [[[undervegas-hub| Undervegas]]] - the famous words from Dante's Inferno, now in neon! It's based on a [https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Las_vegas_sign.svg Las Vegas Sign on Wikimedia], Rounderhouse made a different version based on the same template and I can't really decide which I like more.
[[/div]]

[[div class="art3"]]  
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art%3Alocations-of-interest/Wonder-World.svg title="Wonder World Logo." height="200px"]]
A logo for [[[wonder-world|Wonder World!™]]], the whimsical theme park/company town created by the [[[dr-wondertainment-hub|Dr Wondertainment Corporation]]].
[[/div]]

[[/div]]
